item.description: China's gloomy job market has been one of the key reasons stopping people from spending more.

item.title: Looking to refinance your FHA mortgage? Make it easier and cheaper with a streamline refinance.
item.description: If you have an FHA, VA, or USDA home loan, a streamline refinance mortgage could lower your fees and get it done faster.

item.title: No Christmas winner of billion-dollar Mega Millions jackpot. It’s still growing.
Workplace well-being is at an all-time low. Here are 5 ways employers can actually help
item.description: “Without a supportive workplace culture and strong leadership,” says one expert, “even the best perks feel hollow and performative.”

item.title: South Korea’s opposition prepares to impeach the country’s acting president as political crisis deepens
item.description: Han Duck-soo is refusing to fill vacancies on the Constitutional Court, currently evaluating the impeachment of suspended president Yoon Suk Yeol.
